title: Choose your Next Steps
subtitle1: Select an option below to indicate if you would like
p1: continue on to further competition, with the suppliers you selected, using the online service
p2: go back and edit your capability assessment
subtitle2: If you select Yes or No, you can't edit your capability assessment later.

form.question: Would you like to progress to the second stage?

hint.text: You will not be able to edit your capability assessment.You will need to delete the whole event and start again from the beginning.

items.text: I'm not ready yet, I need to edit my capability assessment

hint.text: You’ll be taken back to your capability assessment where you’ll be able to edit anything you’ve done previously. When you edit a screen, you’ll have to view the new suitable supplier list in order to progress with the next steps.
You’ll be taken to a confirmation screen where you’ll be able to download the suitable list of suppliers and progress to the next stage outside our service.

backJump.title: Return to Write and publish your requirements
